nodes.text: The Unification Campaigns were a series of battles involving the Galactic Republic's Judicial Forces which took place between the years 1000 BBY and 900 BBY, fought to re-unify the Republic in the aftermath of the New Sith Wars. The Judicials, lead by Admiral Lune Banjeer and his successors, fought ably during the conflicts and achieved notable victories during several battles including a battle at the planet Vondarc, a battle in the D'rinba system and a battle at the Klina Marches.
The Unification campaigns were first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, a sourcebook released in 2012 and written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
